pages.text: The Beepost is a command center for your Worker Bees. It does not produce items itself, but instead sends your bees out into the world to perform tasks like farming, mining, or fighting.$(br2)This process requires $(l:beeindustry:items/fuel)Sweet Honey$() as fuel and can be enhanced with various upgrades.
The Beepost GUI allows you to manage up to three bees, each with their own dedicated upgrades. Use the toggle buttons to activate or deactivate each bee slot.
